com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.archetypes: You may select an Aerodactyl to put onto your Bench.

This card can only be attached to {R} Pokémon. This card provides {R} Energy only while this card is attached to a {R} Pokémon.If this card is discarded by an attack of the {R} Pokémon this card is attached to, attach this card from your discard pile to that Pokémon after attacking.(If this card is attached to anything other than a {R} Pokémon, discard this card.)
Burning Energy

This card provides {C} Energy. While in play, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon.
Rainbow Energy

Any damage done to the Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy attached to them is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Assault Vest
Search your deck for 1 Basic Pokémon-EX or 3 Basic Pokémon (except for Pokémon-EX) and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Brigette
Search your deck for 1 Basic Pokémon-EX or 3 Basic Pokémon (except for Pokémon-EX) and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Brigette
Each player puts a Pokémon from his or her discard pile into his or her hand. (Your opponent chooses first.)
Buddy-Buddy Rescue
Put 4 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
Fisherman
The Pokémon this card is attached to has no Retreat Cost.
Float Stone
Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.
During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Choose an option.
Choose 1: •Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.•During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Giovanni's Scheme
Choose 1: •Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.•During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Giovanni's Scheme
Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Glalie-EX.
Glalie Spirit Link
Search your deck for a Pokémon with a Retreat Cost of 3 or more, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Heavy Ball
If the Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is 3 or more, that Pokémon gets +20 HP and can't be Confused. (If that Pokémon is currently Confused, remove that Special Condition.)
Heavy Boots
Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Houndoom-EX.
Houndoom Spirit Link
Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws 4 cards.
Judge
Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Mewtwo-EX.
Mewtwo Spirit Link

Choose which way this card faces before you play it. This ↓ player can't have more than 3 Benched Pokémon.(When this card comes into play, this ↓ player discards Benched Pokémon until he or she has 3 Pokémon on the Bench.)\n\nAny damage done by attacks from this ↓ player’s {G}, {R}, or {W} Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Parallel City
Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Professor's Letter
Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card, shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of it.
Reserved Ticket
Search your deck for a Trainer card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Skyla
Shuffle 3 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
Super Rod
Turn all of your Prize cards face up. (Those Prize cards remain face up for the rest of the game.)
Town Map
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.decks.pcds: Let Sparks Fly!\nRun circles around your opponent's Pokémon with lightning speed, or burn them with a well-placed jet of flame—let loose with the full heat of the Burning Spark theme deck!
Sound a Victory Cry!\nLet rip with a scream from the night, and weave your path to victory in the darkness. Seize the power of Noivern and Gengar in the Night Striker theme deck!
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.products.b: The two Pokémon TCG: Legendary Collections bring you the beloved Pikachu or the mischievous Hoopa as a powerful new Pokémon-EX, plus five different full-art Legendary Pokémon. These collections deliver some of the most famous characters from throughout the Pokémon world!

The two Pokémon TCG: Legendary Collections bring you the beloved Pikachu or the mischievous Hoopa as a powerful new Pokémon-EX, plus five different full-art Legendary Pokémon. These collections deliver some of the most famous characters from throughout the Pokémon world!

A Pokémon treasure chest! Carry your collection anywhere, or share a trove of Pokémon treasures with a fan! This sturdy metal case contains more than a dozen special Pokémon goodies, including many not found anywhere else.
Let Sparks Fly!\nRun circles around your opponent's Pokémon with lightning speed, or burn them with a well-placed jet of flame—let loose with the full heat of the Burning Spark theme deck!
XY—BREAKthrough Elite Trainer Box: Mega Mewtwo X
XY—BREAKthrough Elite Trainer Box: Mega Mewtwo Y
Sound a Victory Cry!\nLet rip with a scream from the night, and weave your path to victory in the darkness. Seize the power of Noivern and Gengar in the Night Striker theme deck!
